plot: In these 10 episodes the presenters tell the story behind expensive or rare cars that they find in the streets of Hollywood, Amsterdam and Las Vegas. At the end of each episode the audience can rank the cars via the website.
plot_en: In these 10 episodes the presenters tell the story behind expensive or rare cars that they find in the streets of Hollywood, Amsterdam and Las Vegas. At the end of each episode the audience can rank the cars via the website.

title: Ranking the cars
